DataElement.preferredName: Protocol American College of Radiology Imaging Network Identifier Date

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Protocol American College of Radiology Imaging Network Identifier
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: information related to the protocol's ACRIN ID.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: An action plan for a clinical trial.  The plan states what the study will do, how, and why.  It explains how many people will be in it, who is eligible to participate, what study agents or other interventions they will be given, what tests they will receive and how often, and what information will be gathered.

Concepts.definition: A formal document that describes a complete plan of research activity in the framework of a clinical study; specifically, the study objective(s), design, methodology, eligibility requests for prospective subjects and controls; intervention regimen(s), proposed methods of analysis of data; statistical considerations, and organization of the study. The protocol usually also provides the background and rationale for the study, but these could be represented in other protocol referenced documents.

Property.preferredDefinition: An FDA-designated accrediting body that includes radiologists, radiation oncologists and medical physicists. The ACR focuses its activity on making imaging safe, effective and accessible trough its accreditation programs, research, and development of guid:One or more characters used to identify, name, or characterize the nature, properties, or contents of a thing.

Concepts.definition: An FDA-designated accrediting body that includes radiologists, radiation oncologists and medical physicists. The ACR focuses its activity on making imaging safe, effective and accessible trough its accreditation programs, research, and development of guidelines for quality imaging, and education.
One or more characters used to identify, name, or characterize the nature, properties, or contents of a thing.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: the management of a research protocol and its case report forms.

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: The date on which an observation was made or an event occurred.

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: a particular day specified as the time something has, or will, happen.

Concepts.definition: The particular day, month and year an event has happened or will happen.
